input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product keywords and product specification below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product specification:
Mikasa Stephanie Iced Beverage Drinkware (Set of 4), 16 oz, Glass

Product keywords:
Exquisitely designed to befit the most prestigious audience
16-ounce capacity iced beverage, perfect for all beverages
The classic design brings elegance and charm to the table
Sized conveniently to meet the needs of every occasion
Dishwasher safe; hand-washing recommended
Lead-free
Curvy shape with narrow stems
Product description:

Product description:
input_text.Response A: These beautiful glasses are perfect for serving iced tea, lemonade, or water at your next party.  The delicate design will add a touch of elegance to your table, and the classic shape will never go out of style.  Each glass holds 16 ounces of liquid, and the set of four glasses is dishwasher safe for easy cleaning.
input_text.Response B:
Indulge in the luxurious experience of sipping your favorite iced beverages with the Mikasa Stephanie Iced Beverage Drinkware (Set of 4), featuring an exquisite design that exudes elegance and charm. Crafted from high-quality glass, these 16-ounce glasses are perfectly sized for all occasions, from a refreshing summer evening soiree to an intimate dinner party.

The classic design of these glasses brings a touch of sophistication to any table setting, while the curvy shape and narrow stems add a playful touch. The lead-free glass ensures the safety of your drinking experience, and the dishwasher-safe and hand-washing-recommended design makes cleaning a breeze.

Whether you're enjoying a cool glass of lemonade, iced tea, or your favorite cocktail, these glasses will elevate your drinking experience to new heights. The set of four glasses provides the perfect amount of variety for entertaining guests or enjoying a refreshing drink alone.

The Mikasa Stephanie Iced Beverage Drinkware (Set of 4) is a must-have for any home or restaurant looking to impress their guests with style and sophistication. The exquisite design, coupled with the high-quality materials and practical features, make these glasses a must-have for any beverage enthusiast. So why wait? Treat yourself to the luxury of Mikasa today!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
